item.title: 米連邦地裁判事、モンタナ州初のTikTok禁止措置の1月1日発効を阻止する仮差し止め命令を下す（ロイター）
item.description:
Reuters:
A US district judge issues a preliminary injunction blocking Montana's first-of-its-kind state ban on TikTok from taking effect on January 1  —  A U.S. judge late on Thursday blocked Montana's first-of-its kind state ban on the use of short-video sharing app TikTok from taking effect on Jan. 1.

item.title: また、イーロン・マスクの発言を受けて、Xへの広告掲載をやめるようアドバイスしているブランドもある。
item.description:
New York Times:
Some marketing agencies say their brands don't plan to return to advertise on X, and others are advising brands to stop posting on X, after Elon Musk's comments  —  Elon Musk, the owner of X, criticized advertisers with expletives on Wednesday at The New York Times's DealBook Summit.

item.title: 法案C-18に基づくカナダのグーグルとの契約：1億カナダドルの大半は大手放送局に支払われ、既存の契約は支払いに組み込まれる可能性が高い（Michael Geist）

A close look at Canada's Google deal under Bill C-18: most of the CA$100M likely will go to big broadcasters and existing deals will be rolled into the payment  —  Canadian Heritage Minister Pascale St-Onge's deal with Google on Bill C-18 for an annual $100 million contribution has sparked …

item.description:
Angelique Jackson / Variety:
Macro hires Jamila Hunter as president of Macro Television Studios; she had been Freeform's executive VP of original programming and development  —  Veteran television executive Jamila Hunter has been named president of Macro Television Studios, … “I couldn't be more excited to welcome Jamila to the company,” stated King.

item.description:
Chris Roush / Talking Biz News:
Memo: Bloomberg plans to launch a digital weekend product in 2024 and relaunch Businessweek as a monthly; Businessweek Editor Joel Weber will move to a new role  —  David Merritt, head of Bloomberg Media Editorial, and Katie Boyce, senior executive editor for Bloomberg Digital …

item.title: 新聞社が漫画家の削減を進めるなか、フルタイムの漫画家を雇用するデジタル媒体もある。
item.description:
Sarah Scire / Nieman Lab:
Some digital outlets are employing full-time cartoonists, as newspapers increasingly cut the role; there were fewer than 30 newspaper cartoonists in 2021  —  Few newspapers still employ full-time cartoonists.  But some digital outlets are turning to the art form.

item.title: 社内メール：Voxはスタッフをレイオフし、「編集の焦点を絞る」。12月1日に全スタッフが集まって変更について話し合う予定（Max Tani/@maxwelltani）
item.description:
Max Tani / @maxwelltani:
Internal email: Vox is laying off staff and “tightening our editorial focus”; an all-staff meeting is planned December 1 to discuss the changes  —  Per an internal email, Vox is laying off staff today [image]

item.title: 英国は、ジェフ・ザッカーによるテレグラフ紙への入札が、首長国の10億ドル規模の資金を使ったものであり、その結果、英国の報道機関に対する外国からの悪影響がもたらされる可能性があるかどうかの調査を開始した（Michael M. Grynbaum/New York Times）。

The UK opens a review into whether Jeff Zucker's bid for The Telegraph, using ~$1B in Emirati money, could result in adverse foreign influence over the UK press  —  British regulators announced a review into whether the bid, backed mostly by funds from the United Arab Emirates …

item.description:
David Folkenflik / NPR:
NPR names Gimlet executive Collin Campbell as its podcast chief, as it looks to regain footing after cutting staff and canceling four podcasts in early 2023  —  NPR named veteran audio executive Collin Campbell as its new podcast chief on Thursday as part of an effort to stabilize its role …

item.title: ネルソン・ペルツのトライアン・パートナーズは、ディズニーが取締役会代表の要請を断った後、「株主への直接の変革要求」を行うつもりだと述べている（Alex Weprin/The Hollywood Reporter）。
item.description:
Alex Weprin / The Hollywood Reporter:
Nelson Peltz's Trian Partners says they intend to take their “case for change directly to shareholders” after Disney turns down its Board representation request  —  Peltz's Trian Partners said Thursday that it “intends to take our case for change directly to shareholders.”

item.title: BEUCとそのメンバーはnoybに続き、EUでメタの月額9.99ユーロ以上のサブスクリプションに対して苦情を申し立てた。
item.description:

The BEUC and its members follow noyb in filing a complaint against Meta's €9.99+/month subscriptions in the EU, saying the tier amounts to charging for privacy  —  Meta Platforms' (META.O) advertising-free subscription service, a fee-based offering rolled out in Europe this month …

item.title: 情報筋MSNBCがメフディ・ハサンの番組をキャンセル、ハサンの後任にアイマン・モヒェルディンの番組を拡大、ハサンはオンカメラ・アナリスト兼フィルイン・ホストに（Max Tani/Semafor）
item.description:
Max Tani / Semafor:
Sources: MSNBC cancels Mehdi Hasan's show and expands Ayman Mohyeldin's program to replace Hasan's show; Hasan will become an on-camera analyst and fill-in host  —  The News  —  MSNBC is canceling outspoken opinion host Mehdi Hasan's weekend program and show on the streaming service Peacock.

item.title: バリ・ワイスのフリー・プレス、「不公平」なイスラエル報道にムッとする読者を惹きつける。フリー・プレスの購読者は現在～52万人、うち約7万5千人が月8ドルを支払っている（Alexandra Bruell/Wall Street Journal）
item.description:
Alexandra Bruell / Wall Street Journal:
Bari Weiss' Free Press attracts readers miffed with “unfair” Israel media coverage; Free Press now has ~520K subscribers, including nearly 75K paying $8/month  —  At the Free Press, the site launched by the former New York Times opinion editor, traffic and subscriptions have surged during Israel-Hamas war
